definition: Graminae or Poaceae, the grass family
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The application of cereal straw increased the soil water contents.
sentences.chinese: 施用禾本科秸杆能增加土壤的水分含量。

sentences.english: Most grass embryos have a flap-like structure known as the epiblast .
sentences.chinese: 大多数禾本科胚有一片瓣状结构通常称为外胚叶。

sentences.english: Annual broadleaf and grass weeds are major problems .
sentences.chinese: 主要问题是一年生阔叶杂草和禾本科杂草。

sentences.english: Caryopsis (grain) (pl. caryopses) A dry indehiscent fruit, typical of the grasses.
sentences.chinese: 一种不开裂的干果，是禾本科植物特有的果实类型。

sentences.english: The cellulization of endosperm in Gramineae was summarized and compared.
sentences.chinese: 文章还对禾本科植物胚乳的细胞化作了比较和总结。

sentences.english: Other plants and grasses also help protect water quality.
sentences.chinese: 其他作物和禾本科植物也可以保护水质。

sentences.english: Any of various usually woody, temperate or tropical grasses of the genera Arundinaria, Bambusa, Dendrocalamus, Phyllostachys, or Sasa.
sentences.chinese: 竹子一种通常为木质的，温带或热带禾本科植物，青。

sentences.english: Annual broadleaf and grass weeds are major problems.
sentences.chinese: 主要问题是一年生阔叶杂草和禾本科杂草。

sentences.english: Achnatherum splendens, belongs to the grass family, largely distributes in Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 芨芨草是黄土高原地区广泛分布的禾本科植物。

sentences.english: Wild rice stem belongs to herb of marsh of gramineous vivacious perennial root.
sentences.chinese: 茭白属于禾本科多年生宿根沼泽草本植物。

sentences.english: The major types of caryopses of the Chinese Gramineae in relation to systematics.
sentences.chinese: 中国主要禾本科植物颍果形态的基本类型与系统分类。

sentences.english: The scar on a seed, such as a bean, indicating the point of attachment to the funiculus.
sentences.chinese: 种子里只有一个子叶，例如禾本科和百合属植物。

definition: monocotyledon (plant family distinguished by single embryonic leaf, includes grasses, orchids and lilies)
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
dicotyledon (plant family distinguished by two embryonic leaves, includes daisies, broadleaved trees, herbaceous plants)
Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
